posts.post_content:
I'm looking for these T205s in particular, with Sovereign backs:

Mullin
Shean (Boston)
Stone
Thomas

If you have others, I probably need upgrades. Condition doesn't really matter, so let me know what you have...even beaters!!

Take Care,
Geno

OK...Lennox has been found.  I’ve updated my Top Five above, so any help would be great.  I also need a bunch of T206s still, and upgrades on my T205s, so let me know what you have!

Cheers, 
Geno

OK, updated the list!  And I have a filler Moriarity on the way from a friend on this board.  So after it gets here, I just need four more to have a complete T205 Sovereign set!

Take Care,
